B1 something that someone says officially, giving information about something: The president made an unexpected announcement this morning. Synonyms
communication formal
declaration (ANNOUNCEMENT)
proclamation
pronouncement formal
statement
the act of announcing something: The announcement of the changes has been delayed.
More examplesFewer examplesHer announcement confirmed (that) she would be resigning as prime minister.The protests are a delayed reaction to last week's announcement.The announcement took Washington and Paris by surprise, but Downing Street had been expecting it.There was a deathly hush after she made the announcement.This announcement follows months of inaction and delay.
